subprotocols.name: Stream Management
subprotocols.purpose: Manages bidirectional and unidirectional streams, including stream creation, data flow, and stream state transitions

subprotocols.name: Flow Control
subprotocols.purpose: Controls data transmission rate at connection and stream level to prevent overwhelming receivers

subprotocols.name: Stream State Management
subprotocols.purpose: Manages stream lifecycle through state machines for sending and receiving, with defined transitions and permitted frame types in each state
